entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
